abstract: Goldman Sachs said it expects additional write-downs of about $1 billion to $12 billion each for several major brokers in the first quarter, with Citigroup estimated to record the highest amount of about $12 billion.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs said it expects additional write-downs of about $1 billion to $12 billion each for several major brokers in the first quarter, with Citigroup estimated to record the highest amount of about $12 billion.

headline.main: Goldman Predicts More Write-Downs for Brokers
